mapper.select: select p.pno, p.titl, p.pric, p.content, p.sdt, p.edt, p.tno, t.spono, t.comaddr, p.lat, p.lng, (((6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(p.lat))*cos(radians(p.lng) -radians(#{lon}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(p.lat)))))*1000) AS meter, i.pimg from promotion p inner join tcher t on p.tno = t.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where i.titlepic = 1 and p.expire < 2 having meter < 3000 ORDER BY meter LIMIT 0,3000

SELECT p.pno, p.titl, t.tno, m.name, t.comaddr, p.content, p.lng, p.lat, t.spono, t.introduction, (((6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(p.lat))*cos(radians(p.lng) -radians(#{lon}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(p.lat)))))*1000) AS meter , i.pimg FROM memb m left join tcher t on t.tno = m.mno left join promotion p on p.tno = t.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where i.titlepic = 1 and p.expire < 2 GROUP BY m.id having meter < 3000 ORDER BY meter LIMIT 0,3000

SELECT p.pno, p.titl, t.tno, m.name, t.comaddr, p.content, p.lng, p.lat, t.spono, t.introduction, (((6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(p.lat))*cos(radians(p.lng) -radians(#{lon}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(p.lat)))))*1000) AS meter, i.pimg FROM memb m left join tcher t on t.tno = m.mno left join promotion p on p.tno = t.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where i.titlepic = 1 and p.expire < 2 GROUP BY m.id having meter < 3000 ORDER BY meter LIMIT 0,3000
mapper.insert: insert into promotion(titl, pric, content, tno, lat, lng, sdt, edt, expire) values( #{title}, #{pric}, #{content}, #{tno}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{sdt}, #{edt}, 0)
insert into promotionimg(pno, pimg, titlePic) values( #{no}, #{pimg}, #{title})
mapper.select: select p.pno, p.titl, p.sdt, p.edt, p.pric, t.company, t.comaddr, t.comdetailaddr, p.content, p.tno, p.lat, p.lng, i.pimg, p.expire from tcher t left outer join promotion p on t.tno = p.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where p.pno < #{lastNo} and p.pno > #{lastNo}-6 and p.pno > 0 and i.titlepic = 1 and p.expire < 2 order by p.pno desc

select p.pno, p.titl, p.sdt, p.edt, p.pric, t.company, t.comaddr, t.comdetailaddr, p.content, p.tno, p.lat, p.lng, i.pimg, p.expire from tcher t left outer join promotion p on t.tno = p.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where p.pno > 0 and i.titlepic = 1 and p.expire < 2 order by p.pno desc limit 0, 6;

select p.pno, p.titl, p.sdt, p.edt, p.pric, t.company, t.comaddr, t.comdetailaddr, p.content, p.tno, p.lat, p.lng, i.pimg, p.expire from tcher t left outer join promotion p on t.tno = p.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where p.pno > 0 and t.spono = #{typeNo} and i.titlepic = 1 and p.expire < 2 order by p.pno desc limit 0, 6;

select p.pno, p.titl, p.sdt, p.edt, p.pric, t.company, t.comaddr, t.comdetailaddr, p.content, p.tno, p.lat, p.lng, i.pimg, p.expire from tcher t left outer join promotion p on t.tno = p.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where p.pno <= #{lastNo} and i.titlepic = 1 and p.expire < 2 and p.pno > #{lastNo}-6 and p.pno > 0 and t.spono = #{typeNo}
order by p.pno desc

select p.pno, p.titl, p.sdt, p.edt, p.pric, t.company, t.comaddr, t.comdetailaddr, p.content, p.tno, p.lat, p.lng, i.pimg, p.expire, (select pimg from promotionimg where pno = #{no} and titlepic = 1) as tipic from tcher t left outer join promotion p on t.tno = p.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where p.pno = #{no};

select p.*, t.*, i.pimg, p.expire from promotion p inner join tcher t on p.tno=t.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno
where t.tno = #{no} and i.titlepic = 1 and p.expire < 2 order by p.pno desc
mapper.update: update promotion set expire = 2 where pno=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from promotion p inner join tcher t on p.tno=t.tno left outer join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where t.tno = #{no} and p.expire < 2 order by p.titl asc
select i.pimg, p.pno from promotion p inner join promotionimg i on p.pno = i.pno where titlePic = 1 and p.tno = #{no}
mapper.update: update promotion set titl=#{title}, pric=#{pric}, sdt=#{sdt}, edt=#{edt}, content=#{content} where pno=#{pno}
update promotion set expire = 1 where sdt = curdate() or (sdt < curdate() and edt >= curdate())
update promotion set expire = 2 where edt <= curdate()
